name: Runner (itch) (PaperAero555)
description:
Controls

  • WASD to move around, double jump and climb from the side of the block
  • Enter to Start
  • F5 to Reset High Score

Blocks

  • Reds hurt you and you will die if hit too many times
  • Oranges speed up the scrolling
  • Yellow bounces you up like a spring
  • Green increases your speed
  • Finally, Blue falls after touching

Warning

Everything is luck-based and there will be a chance that it will be impossible. You have been warned

High Score

Screenshot your high score and I'll add you to the leaderboards!
